source.09580c39:
def _add1(x): return x+1
dumb_tfm = RandTransform(enc=_add1, p=0.5)
start,d1,d2 = 2,False,False
for _ in range(40):
    t = dumb_tfm(start, split_idx=0)
    if dumb_tfm.do: test_eq(t, start+1); d1=True
    else:           test_eq(t, start)  ; d2=True
assert d1 and d2
dumb_tfm
